title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard for nested classes, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank even though a .java file is open in the editor.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor. 
2. Click the new class button. 
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field. 
Expected result: The 'Enclosing Type' field should be populated with the current type in the editor.
